events.message: We have successfully received your application for the Software Engineer role and have started processing your information.
Your application was reviewed and categorized under the Engineering cluster based on your relevant software development experience.
A dedicated recruiter has been assigned to your profile to guide you through the engineering recruitment process.
We completed the initial screening interview to discuss your engineering skills and experience in software development.
Thank you for your prompt response and the detailed answers you provided during the initial screening for the developer role.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for next week with our senior software engineers to further assess your coding skills.
